title: At random points in the game it wont let me do anything, please help
body: When i'm playing League sometimes it randomly wont let me move my champion or do anything, this has been making playing a gamble because some games it will happen a little or at non important parts and others all the time. Also if i move somewhere my champion will keep going until it reaches the destination or i can move again.

replies.body: It sounds like you're facing input delays, which is usually caused by sudden/random lag spikes.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for the games this is happening in.  It will give an overview to really know for sure, as well as troubleshooting steps specific to your issue.  Let me know if you have any questions!
